title: Industry Partnerships
section1-heading: The sponsors and partners who support us
section1-description: Thanks to all of our current sponsors and partners!
Their support ensures that we can continue innovating and breaking through new barriers in space.
section2-description: If you are interested in shaping the coming age of space exploration along our side with a sponsorship or donation, please contact us at
section3-description: Learn what we offer to our sponsors and partners
section3-text: By signing up, we will keep your information strictly confidential.
